category.name: gallery.category
category.item: Do you really want to delete this category? All child categories of this category will be moved to this category’s parent category. Images which are only in this category will be deleted.

Click on the image to add a marker at that position.

The album has been created. Unfortunately you have reached your limit and cannot create any more albums.
The archive has been uploaded and the contained files are currently being processed.

The images can be up to {@$__wcf->session->getPermission('user.gallery.maxSize')|filesize} each with the file extensions {@$allowedFileExtensions}. The minimum dimensions are {#GALLERY_IMAGE_MIN_WIDTH}×{#GALLERY_IMAGE_MIN_HEIGHT} pixels up to a maximum of {#$__wcf->session->getPermission('user.gallery.maxWidth')}×{#$__wcf->session->getPermission('user.gallery.maxHeight')} pixels. You can upload images using a Zip-, Tar-, or Gzip-archive. You can upload {#($__wcf->session->getPermission('user.gallery.maxImages') - $userImageCount)} image{if $__wcf->session->getPermission('user.gallery.maxImages') - $userImageCount > 1}s{/if} with a maximum disk space usage of {@($__wcf->session->getPermission('user.gallery.quota') - $usedQuota)|filesize}. If you have uploaded multiple images, you can edit each image separately by clicking on their thumbnail. You will need at least two images 1200x900 pixels in order to display in gallery slider.
The archive “{$file->getFilename()}” does not contain images.
The archive “{$file->getFilename()}” does not contain valid images.
The file “{if $file|isset}{$file->getFilename()}{else}{$filename}{/if}” has an invalid extension.
One or more fields are erroneous, please check the input fields of the highlighted images by clicking on the thumbnails.
You cannot upload more than {if GALLERY_MAX_PARALLEL_IMAGE_UPLOADS != 1}{#GALLERY_MAX_PARALLEL_IMAGE_UPLOADS} images{else}one image{/if} in parallel.
The file “{$file->getFilename()}” is not an image.
You have exceeded your storage limit and cannot upload new images. You must delete existing images to free up some space.
You have exceeded your maximum image limit and cannot upload new images. You must delete existing images to free up some space.
An unknown error occurred during the upload of “{$file->getFilename()}”.
Thumbnails are currently being created, you will automatically be redirected upon completion.
You are not watching any images at the moment.

category.name: gallery.index
category.item: Image Gallery: WoltLab Gallery™{if SHOW_VERSION_NUMBER} {@PACKAGE_VERSION}{/if}, developed by WoltLab® GmbH

{#$stats[authors]} Author{if $stats[authors] != 1}s{/if} - {#$stats[albums]} Album{if $stats[albums] != 1}s{/if} - {#$stats[images]} Image{if $stats[images] != 1}s{/if} ({#$stats[imagesPerDay]} Image{if $stats[imagesPerDay] != 1}s{/if} per Day) - {@$stats[size]|filesize} Total File Size - {#$stats[comments]} Comment{if $stats[comments] != 1}s{/if}

category.item: Viewing albums by {$user->username}

category.name: wcf.acl.option
category.item: Can add images to this category

category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: Can disable comments on their images
The maximum number of albums allowed per user.
The maximum height in pixels for uploaded images, the system will attempt to downsize images that exceed this height.
The maximum number of images allowed per user.
The maximum width in pixels for uploaded images, the system will attempt to downsize images that exceed this width.
The maximum disk space allowed for images, thumbnails are excluded from this quota.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Only images from the selected categories will be displayed in this box. To disable, do not select any categories.
The number of images that will be cycled.
Images are considered for the ‘image grid’ box if uploaded by the following days. Use 0 for infinite.
Only images from the selected categories will be displayed in this box. To disable, do not select any categories.
The number of images that will be cycled.
Images are considered for the ‘images in motion’ box if uploaded by the following days. Use 0 for infinite.
Most commented images are considered if uploaded by the following days.
Images are removed from the trash by the following days. Use 0 to disable.
The maximum number of categories per image.
The minimum height in pixels for uploaded images.
The minimum width in pixels for uploaded images.
Attention! Applying the watermark on the original image is permanent and cannot be reversed later.
The margin in pixels from the edges of the images.
The placeholder “{literal}{$username}{/literal}” will be replaced with the author’s username.
Set the transparency in percent. Use 0 to disable.
The maximum number of parallel uploads per user.
Display user’s latest images in profile sidebar
Display user’s uploaded image count in profile sidebar

category.item: Rebuilds the album counters and covers.
Rebuilds the counters of gallery images.
Rebuilds the thumbnails of gallery images.
